name: Screamer 2
description: Six winding, wildly dangerous tracks with varying levels of difficulty, terrain, driving conditions and configurations.Power to customize up to 20 high performance race cars means you can check yourself before you wreck yourself.Incredible physics for real-time jumping, turning, spinning, and twisting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 780 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0
